conbody.p: The Domain Name System (DNS) is an Internet standard that maps unique DNS names (for example: www.example.com) to the underlying public IP address (for example: 128.0.0.1).

Eucalyptus provides a DNS service with your cloud. By default, "EC2 classic" (EDGE, MANAGED, and MANAGED-NOVLAN modes) and VPCMIDO mode default subnet instances that are launched in your Eucalyptus cloud are automatically assigned public and private DNS names from the Eucalyptus DNS service.
